name: Pastel Soft
description: 優しいパステルカラーで構成された柔らかな印象のテーマ
mood: 柔らかい、優しい、親しみやすい
use_cases: 教育プラットフォーム
ライフスタイルアプリ

button.primary: bg-primary-300 hover:bg-primary-400 active:bg-primary-500 text-primary-900 font-medium rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 shadow-sm transition-all duration-200
button.secondary: bg-secondary-200 hover:bg-secondary-300 text-secondary-900 font-medium rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 shadow-sm transition-all duration-200
button.outline: border-2 border-primary-300 text-primary-700 hover:bg-primary-50 font-medium rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 transition-colors duration-200

card.default: bg-white border border-primary-100 rounded-3xl shadow-sm p-6
card.soft: bg-gradient-to-br from-primary-50 via-secondary-50 to-accent-50 border border-primary-100 rounded-3xl shadow-md p-6

input.default: border-2 border-primary-200 rounded-full px-4 py-2.5 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-300 focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200 placeholder:text-neutral-400
input.error: border-2 border-error-300 rounded-full px-4 py-2.5 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-error-300

badge.primary: bg-primary-200 text-primary-800 text-sm font-semibold px-3 py-1 rounded-full
badge.secondary: bg-secondary-200 text-secondary-800 text-sm font-semibold px-3 py-1 rounded-full
badge.accent: bg-accent-200 text-accent-800 text-sm font-semibold px-3 py-1 rounded-full
badge.success: bg-success-100 text-success-800 text-sm font-semibold px-3 py-1 rounded-full
